      Card Deck.newCard()
      Converts the HashMap containing the cards to an ArrayList, chooses a random card from the ArrayList, and returns that card.

      Methods in uni.joel.deckard.logic with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Hand.addCard(Card card)
      Adds the given card to the hand.
      void Deck.addCards(Card card, int amount)
      Adds the given amount of the given card to the deck.
      void Player.addToDeck(Card card)
      Adds the given card to deck.
      void Player.addToHand(Card card)
      Adds the given card to hand.
      int Hand.amountOfCard(Card card)
      Returns the amount of the given card in the hand.
      int Deck.amountOfCard(Card card)
      Returns the amount of the given card in the deck.
      void Hand.removeAmountOfCard(Card card, int removeAmount)
      Removes the specified amount of the given card from the hand, or as much as possible if the amount to be removed is larger than the amount of card in the hand.
      void Hand.removeCard(Card card)
      Removes one of the given card from the hand.
      void Deck.removeCardAll(Card card)
      Removes all of the given card from the deck.
      void Deck.removeCardAmount(Card card, int toRemove)
      Removes the given amount of the specified card from the deck.
      boolean Player.useCard(Card card)
      Uses the specified card.

      Subclasses of Card in uni.joel.deckard.logic.cards 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AttackCard
      An attacking card that reduces the using player's opponents health.
      class  BypassAttackCard 
      class  DefenseCard
      A defense Card increases your armor value by a set amount.
      class  GainHealthCard
      A gainHealthCard increases your health by a set amount.
      class  TestCard
      Testing card class used for testing the methods in class Card with concrete objects.
